      • checkJoin

        public static java.lang.String checkJoin​(java.lang.String msg)
        This method meant to check if the client can join to the shared delivery.
        Parameters:
        msg - msg is the message that we get from the client.It's includes the order's number of the shared delivery.
        Returns:
        String that string includes the time, date and if it's early order- of the order that the client wants to join

      • InsertShared

        public static void InsertShared​(java.lang.String msg)
        This method meant to update the shared delivery and the total price of all the participants/
        Parameters:
        msg - msg is the message that we get from the client.It's includes the type of delivery, number of participants and the order number of the delivery that the client wants to join.
